description: Numbers that are congruent to {3, 5} mod 6.
comments: Apart from initial term(s), dimension of the space of weight 2n cusp forms for Gamma_0( 10 ).
links: B. Berselli, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 (From _Bruno Berselli_, Jun 24 2010)
William A. Stein, Dimensions of the spaces S_k(Gamma_0(N))
William A. Stein, The modular forms database
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,-1).
formula: a(n) = sqrt(2)*sqrt((1-6*n)*(-1)^n+18*n^2-6*n+1)/2. - _Paul Barry_, May 11 2003From _Bruno Berselli_, Jun 24 2010: (Start)G.f.: (3+2*x+x^2)/((1+x)*(1-x)^2).a(n)-a(n-1)-a(n-2)+a(n-3) = 0, with n>3.a(n) = (6*n-(-1)^n-1)/2. (End)a(n)=6*n-a(n-1)-4 with n>1, a(1)=3. [_Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
